markdown:
| icon           = poe2 plain_letter icon.png
| description    = Hello lovesome,

I hear you've got a deal (another one, really?) going on with Furrante to muck around in the mess that is Crookspur Island. Before you go sailing in to do that cock-rot's bidding, come and have a chat with me, will you? I've got a proposition for you I think you'll find wickedly enticing.

I'll reserve a berth for [Player Ship] at Fort Deadlight's docks.

Your most ruthless but truthful friend (or damn my blood), Aeldys

PS - Bring some more candied nuts. You know how I like them.
| added_in       = poe2

##  Trivia 

* You can actually bring [Aeldys](/captainAeldys/) the [Candied Nuts](/candiedNuts/) for some unique dialogue and Minor Positive Reputation gained with Principi sen Patrena.
